author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of Social Democratic Party of India staged a demonstration at Palladam on Sunday demanding better medical services at Palladam taluk-government hospital.

M. Yasser, district joint secretary of SDPI, alleged that the people who go to the hospital with relatively minor injuries too were getting referred to other hospitals due to lack of adequate number of specialists.

“Laboratory technicians are also not posted at requisite strength which prevents testing of samples in the case of many diseases”, he said.

The SDPI men also demanded an inquiry into the behaviour of a medical staff in inebriated on the institution premises a few days back.
title: Demonstration staged
